Title: The Boone Identity
Plot: A grieving father asks Harry to help put his daughter's spirit to rest. This should be easy. All Dresden has to do is track down the killer and make sure that justice has been done. There's only one catch: the killer died only hours after the murder.
GuestStars: John Robinson,  Judy Marshak,  Domenic Cuzzocrea,  Tom Barnett,  Kaleigh Nevin,  C. David Johnson,  Kevin Rushton
